skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Akuvox is a pioneer of smart intercom, allowing you to open doors and arm or disarm indoor monitors through Alexa. More information about Akuvox Indoor you can visit http://www.akuvox.com/ 
 
Here’s a step by step guide:
(1). Get a akuvox devices;
(2). Register a Akuvox Cloud account;
(3). Download Amazon "Alexa" app from Amazon Market, Google Play or iOS App Store, and connect Echo with "Alexa" app;
(4). Search the Alexa Skills directory for "Smart Akuvox";
(5). Click Enable skill of "Smart Akuvox", then input your account username, password and region on the linking page;
(6). Talk to Echo "Alexa,discover devices.". Wait till Echo says "Discover is completed";
(7). Now all setup is done. Try talk to Echo to control your devices.

Note: You will have to select a four-digit voice code in Alexa app in order to disarm your Indoor. Once selected, the system can be voice-armed and disarmed by anyone who gives the command to Alexa with the four-digit code.
 
For example, you can use it like this:
User: Alexa, arm indoor.(default set stay mode，you also can set away or night mode)
Skill: indoor is armed in stay mode.
Then your indoor will set system in stay mode.

User: Alexa, is indoor armed?
Skill: indoor is armed in stay mode..
Then your Echo will report state of the indoor system's arm status.

User: Alexa, disarm indoor.
Skill:What's your voice code for home?
User: xxxx. (which number that you set in alexa app)
Skill: indoor is disarmed..
Then your indoor will set system in disarmed mode.

User: Alexa, Unlock front Door.
Skill:What's your voice code for home?
User: xxxx. (which number that you set in alexa app)
Then your door will be opened.
